rows.label: bf06450100_0020
rows.name:
It's the remains of a battlefield 
from the Holy Grail War.

rows.label: bf06450100_0025
rows.name: There are many things here I remember...

rows.label: bf06450100_0030
rows.name:
The walls and floors are melted...
Must've been a hell of a battle.

rows.label: bf06450100_0050
rows.name:
not just Siren and Serpent 
that Hikari-chan wields.

rows.label: bf06450100_0060
rows.name:
At that time, countless[System:Ruby rt=Devices ]Servants[/System:Ruby] were
wielded by Metsu.
